data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 512 512'%3E%3Ccircle cx='256' cy='256' r='256' fill='%2300ff88'/%3E%3Cg transform='translate(256,256)'%3E%3C!-- Candlestick chart elements --%3E%3Cg%3E%3C!-- Bar 1 - Bearish --%3E%3Cline x1='-80' y1='-40' x2='-80' y2='40' stroke='%23ffffff' stroke-width='2'/%3E%3Crect x='-90' y='-10' width='20' height='30' fill='%23ff4757'/%3E%3C!-- Bar 2 - Bullish --%3E%3Cline x1='-30' y1='-50' x2='-30' y2='30' stroke='%23ffffff' stroke-width='2'/%3E%3Crect x='-40' y='-20' width='20' height='40' fill='%23ffffff'/%3E%3C!-- Bar 3 - Bearish --%3E%3Cline x1='20' y1='-30' x2='20' y2='50' stroke='%23ffffff' stroke-width='2'/%3E%3Crect x='10' y='10' width='20' height='25' fill='%23ff4757'/%3E%3C!-- Bar 4 - Bullish --%3E%3Cline x1='70' y1='-60' x2='70' y2='20' stroke='%23ffffff' stroke-width='2'/%3E%3Crect x='60' y='-30' width='20' height='45' fill='%23ffffff'/%3E%3C/g%3E%3C!-- Trend line overlay --%3E%3Cpolyline points='-80,15 -30,-35 20,42 70,-45' fill='none' stroke='%231a1a2e' stroke-width='4' stroke-linecap='round'/%3E%3C/g%3E%3C/svg%3E
